name: Coal Miner #1
description:
Animated GIF | 6 fps| 2048 x 2048 | RGB | sRGB IEC61966-2.1

An ordinary hand drawn motive of a coal miner with the use of an ordinary coal brush in the software Procreate. Digital Art is able to bring art to perfection. But turning it into an animated GIF with two more drawings, this portrait reveals the limitation and imperfection of an ordinary human hand drawing and its lack of replicability. This is where human individuality and its beauty within unveils itself.

DG
